description: Essentials of normal nutrition and its relationship to the health of individuals and families. These concepts serve as a basis for the development of an understanding of therapeutic application of dietary principles and the nurse's role and responsibility in this facet of patient care.
name: PRINCIPLES OF HUMAN NUTRITION

values.comments: Students were decidedly mixed in their reviews of Professor Bergen. While several enjoyed her teaching style and her affable manner, others disagreed. These students complained about overly difficult tests, a tendency to dwell on tangential questions, and a failure to cover material in the syllabus.
